> > She smirked. "Besides, if you are anything like the Autobot 
> Wheeljack I 
> > 'knew' of, then such a task is nothing."
> 
> "Eh, it's no problem."  Wheeljack-X pops out a scanning tool and 
> begins measuring her body to see what he has to work with.  "I like 
> doing this sort of thing."  After a few moments of examination and 
> planning, he projects a scaled-down wireframe image of her body in 
> the air, and next to it a similar image of the vehicle mode that 
> would best match such a body type.  Superimposing the two, he gets 
a 
> rough blueprint to work from.  "I'm gonna have to take you offline 
> for a while, while I install the upgrade."

"Very well," she stated with a grace & sophistication in her voice. 
She awaited for his instructions.

"Oh, and for your information... there are some raw materials in the 
hold, including Cybertronium. I would prefer my old form back just as 
it once was."


>>OOC: BTW, there is pix of Maxima in her transforming mode under 
Photos, it's the 2nd form, both robot & jet mode. If you wish, she 
can have a tank mode as well, just I don't have the tank pic yet. 
Under Files is the details of her height, speed, etc. Her exo cover 
is basically as tough as Arcee's if not slightly toughter. 
Have fun.
